content: विवृध् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To grow, increase. {@--2@} To thrive, prosper. {@--3@} To spring up, arise. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To increase, augment. {@--2@} To promote, advance, further. {@--3@} To raise, elevate. {@--4@} To gratify, exhilarate. {@--5@} To congratulate (one) upon.
